experience.title: Data Scientist - Cross-Sell & AI Products Team
experience.description: Only Intern to work across 5 different projects & deploy in-house AI products, saving INR 3.6Cr per year incurred due to third-party APIs• Built in-house OCR for Aadhar & PAN ID in compliance with Legal & Tech Teams to outperform third party APIs by 38% on accuracy• Designed & Developed a GenerativeAI Product in collaboration with the Legal Team to automate legal scrutiny of customer documents• Enhanced Document Classifier product to categorize 8 document types with 96% accuracy, utilizing YoloV5, OpenCV, and Pytesseract
experience.description_html: Only Intern to work across 5 different projects & deploy in-house AI products, saving INR 3.6Cr per year incurred due to third-party APIs• Built in-house OCR for Aadhar & PAN ID in compliance with Legal & Tech Teams to outperform third party APIs by 38% on accuracy• Designed & Developed a GenerativeAI Product in collaboration with the Legal Team to automate legal scrutiny of customer documents• Enhanced Document Classifier product to categorize 8 document types with 96% accuracy, utilizing YoloV5, OpenCV, and Pytesseract

experience.title: Strategy & Investments Analyst
experience.description: Analyzed India’s D2C Sector to identify lucrative whitespaces opportunities, creating an investment deck garnering the chairman’s attention• Conducted quantitative analysis of 500+ startups to shortlist best investment opportunities across 7 sub sectors in pre-seed to series-B stage• Charted investment notes for 25+ D2C startups by interacting with their founders analyzing company’s financials like ARR, CM1 & CM2• Crafted an investment deck to analyze the D2C sector growth, challenges & customer behaviour to identify whitespaces for investment
experience.description_html: Analyzed India’s D2C Sector to identify lucrative whitespaces opportunities, creating an investment deck garnering the chairman’s attention• Conducted quantitative analysis of 500+ startups to shortlist best investment opportunities across 7 sub sectors in pre-seed to series-B stage• Charted investment notes for 25+ D2C startups by interacting with their founders analyzing company’s financials like ARR, CM1 & CM2• Crafted an investment deck to analyze the D2C sector growth, challenges & customer behaviour to identify whitespaces for investment

experience.title: AI Researcher
experience.description: Optimized biofuels production by creating synthetic Time Series data and recommended strains using an ensemble of machine learning models• Implemented state of the art research papers on biofuel optimization to generate synthetic time series data and perform quantitative analysis• Boosted the production quantity of Isoprenol by 23% using the Automated Recommendation Tool, which uses an ensemble of 6 ML models• Generated artificial Time series data of biofuels by building a kinetic model using SciPy's differential functions and visualized it using Seaborn
experience.description_html: Optimized biofuels production by creating synthetic Time Series data and recommended strains using an ensemble of machine learning models• Implemented state of the art research papers on biofuel optimization to generate synthetic time series data and perform quantitative analysis• Boosted the production quantity of Isoprenol by 23% using the Automated Recommendation Tool, which uses an ensemble of 6 ML models• Generated artificial Time series data of biofuels by building a kinetic model using SciPy's differential functions and visualized it using Seaborn

experience.title: Strategy and Product Researcher
experience.description: Strategized in creating a website builder product as a service which delivers user ready, e-commerce websites to business owners in 7 hours• Surveyed the freelance and local website builder markets in 5+ metropolitan cities to identify pain points of the customers using SWOT• Formulated the Ideal Customer Profile consisting of 9 crucial factors and analyzed the user research data to identify potential customers• Secured 10+ clients by 1st week of product prototype launch by driving business initiatives across design, sales, marketing, and product teams
